memberdef.argsstring: (function() { detailRef.on("value", function(snapshot) { var number='No.'+snapshot.child(key).val().reservationNumber;var hospital=snapshot.child(key).val().hospital;var petName=snapshot.child(key).val().petName;var petSpecies=snapshot.child(key).val().petSpecies;var type=snapshot.child(key).val().purpose;var message=snapshot.child(key).val().message;date=snapshot.child(key).val().date;origin_time=snapshot.child(key).val().time;area=snapshot.child(key).val().area;document.getElementById('Number').value=number;document.getElementById('Name').value=hospital;document.getElementById('Petname').value=petName;document.getElementById('Petspecies').value=petSpecies;document.getElementById('Message').value=message;document.getElementById('date').value=date;$('#date').change();if(type==='미용') { $("#Purpose option:eq(0)").prop("selected", true);} else if(type==='예방접종') { $("#Purpose option:eq(1)").prop("selected", true);} else if(type==='정기검진') { $("#Purpose option:eq(2)").prop("selected", true);} else if(type==='치료') { $("#Purpose option:eq(3)").prop("selected", true);} });})
memberdef.name: ready

param.type: function() { detailRef.on("value", function(snapshot) { var number='No.'+snapshot.child(key).val().reservationNumber;var hospital=snapshot.child(key).val().hospital;var petName=snapshot.child(key).val().petName;var petSpecies=snapshot.child(key).val().petSpecies;var type=snapshot.child(key).val().purpose;var message=snapshot.child(key).val().message;date=snapshot.child(key).val().date;origin_time=snapshot.child(key).val().time;area=snapshot.child(key).val().area;document.getElementById('Number').value=number;document.getElementById('Name').value=hospital;document.getElementById('Petname').value=petName;document.getElementById('Petspecies').value=petSpecies;document.getElementById('Message').value=message;document.getElementById('date').value=date;$('#date').change();if(type==='미용') { $("#Purpose option:eq(0)").prop("selected", true);} else if(type==='예방접종') { $("#Purpose option:eq(1)").prop("selected", true);} else if(type==='정기검진') { $("#Purpose option:eq(2)").prop("selected", true);} else if(type==='치료') { $("#Purpose option:eq(3)").prop("selected", true);} });}

detaileddescription.para:
When selecting a date, add the hospital, free time on that date to the time option.
param
Date Select event

briefdescription.para: Method to sort the options in select.

detaileddescription.para:
Arrange the available times in ascending order.
param
Select element in HTML

After the user modifies the reservation details, press the button to update the content in the Firebase database.
param
none
